detections.label: <<FORMULA_0479>>
detections.error_description: The first factor should be I - 2 v1 v1^T; it is incorrectly written as I + 2 v1 v1^T, which prevents representing the rotation as a product of two reflections.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0428>>
detections.error_description: Mismatched index: left-hand side uses \widehat\mC_l, but right-hand side defines it with k (\widehat\mC_l := ... in terms of k). The indices l and k are inconsistent.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0457>>
detections.formula:
\widehat\mH_{2k}^{(2)} = \begin{cases}
        \overline\mH^{(2)}_1 \text{ if } k \bmod 2 = 0 \\
        \overline\mH^{(2)}_2 \text{ if } k \bmod 2 = 1 
    \end{cases}, \quad     \widehat\mH_{2k - 1}^{(2)} = \begin{cases}
        \overline\mH^{(2)}_3 \text{ if } k \bmod 2 = 0 \\
        \overline\mH^{(2)}_4 \text{ if } k \bmod 2 = 1 
    \end{cases}.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0004>>
detections.error_description: In the recurrence, the two terms A(x_i) H_{i-1} and B(x_i) are multiplied together. The usual LRNN recurrence uses addition: H_i = A(x_i) H_{i-1} + B(x_i). The product leads to dimension/consistency issues.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0378>>
detections.error_description: In the (1,2) entry of J_i^k, the term uses λ_l^{k-1} instead of λ_i^{k-1}; a mismatched index (l vs i) should be λ_i^{k-1} to match the Jordan-block structure.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0215>>
detections.error_description: The sign function has non-disjoint branches: 1 if x ≥ 0 and -1 if x > 0; the second condition should be x < 0 (with a separate case for x = 0) or the first should be x > 0 and the second x ≤ 0. As written, x > 0 is already covered by x ≥ 0, causing ambiguity.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0356>>
detections.formula:
a_{2k} &= \sum_{i=1}^n \hat{c}_i\binom{2k}{m_i}  |\lambda_i|^{2k- m_i}, \quad \hat{c}_i = c_i\mathrm{sign}(\lambda_i)^{2k- m_i} \\
a_{2k+1} &= \sum_{i=1}^n \tilde{c}_i\binom{2k+1}{m_i}  |\lambda_i|^{2k+1- m_i}, \quad \tilde{c}_i = c_i \mathrm{sign}(\lambda_i)^{2k+1- m_i},

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0643>>
<<FORMULA_0406>>
detections.error_description: The piecewise definition of hat H_k and hat y_k uses a 2-period parity rule (even -> H1, odd -> H2), but the surrounding derivation later derives a 4-period pattern for H_k (via H_{2k} and H_{2k+1}) depending on k, making the two descriptions inconsistent.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0694>>
detections.error_description: The last relation contains a corrupted macro: '\mH\geft(\gamma-\alpha)' should be '\mH(\gamma-\alpha)'. This appears to be a typographical/macro error in the function call.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0652>>
detections.error_description: Line 2 uses y_t^{(s-1)} as the second component of dec^{(s)}(H_t, w_t^{(s)}), but dec^{(s)} should return (δ^{(s)}(q_0^{(s)}, v^{(s)}), w_t^{(s)}); this is an index/subscript inconsistency.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0647>>
detections.error_description: The update term uses a subtraction before B^{(i)}(w_t^{(i)}); it should likely be addition: H_t^{(i)} = A^{(i)}(w_t^{(i)}) H_{t-1}^{(i)} + B^{(i)}(w_t^{(i)})

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0507>>
<<FORMULA_0696>>
detections.error_description: In the final step, the rotation angle is 2(i+j)π/m, which would map to v_{i+j mod m}, but it is equated to v_{i - j mod m}. This sign inconsistency indicates an addition-to-subtraction mismatch in the angle versus the resulting index.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0695>>
detections.error_description: The line R(θ(j,1) - θ(i,0)) is equated to R(-2(i+j)π/m) using inconsistent angle definitions; θ(i,0) and θ(j,1) are not defined compatibly across steps, causing an incorrect exponent for the rotation (the subsequent equality to vc_{i+j mod m} relies on this flawed angle accounting).

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0681>>
detections.formula:
\vh^{(2)}_{0} = (1,0)^\top, \quad  \vh^{(2)}_t = \mA^{(2)}(\vy^{(1)}_t) \vh^{(2)}_{t + 1}, \quad \vy^{(2)}_t = \mathrm{dec}^{(2)}(\vh_t^{(2)}, \vy^{(1)}_t)  \\
    \mA^{(2)}(\vy) = \mH(\theta(y_1, y_2)) = \left[\begin{array}{cc}
\cos \theta(y_1, y_2) &  \sin \theta(y_1, y_2) \\
\sin \theta(y_1, y_2) & -\cos \theta(y_1, y_2)
\end{array}\right] \\
    \mathrm{dec}^{(2)}(\vh, \vy) = \argmax_{i \in \{0, \dots, m-1\}} \max (\vc_i^\top \vh, \vd_i^\top \vh) \quad
detections.error_description: The 2D reflection matrix H(α) is incorrectly written: a reflection across a line with angle α should have entries involving cos 2α and sin 2α (i.e., H(α) = [cos 2α, sin 2α; sin 2α, -cos 2α]); the given matrix [cos α, sin α; sin α, -cos α] corresponds to a line angle α/2, which leads to incorrect composition identities (e.g., H(α)H(γ) = R(α−γ) instead of R(2(α−γ))).

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0706>>
detections.formula:
\vh_{i+1}^{(2)} = \begin{cases}
        \mH(\theta(x_{i+1}, 1))  \vh_{i}^{(2)} = \mH(\theta(x_{i+1}, 1))  \vc_{y_i} = \vc_{x_{i+1} + y_i \bmod m} = \vc_{y_{i+1}}  \text{ if } i \bmod 2 = 1\\
        \mH(\theta(x_{i+1}, 0))  \vh_{i}^{(2)} = \mH(\theta(x_{i+1}, 0))  \vd_{s_i} = \vd_{x_{i+1} + y_i \bmod m} = \vd_{y_{i - 1}} \text{ if } i \bmod 2 = 0
    \end{cases}.
detections.error_description: Required parentheses around the sum before applying mod: (x_{i+1} + y_i) mod m; without parentheses it may be interpreted as x_{i+1} + (y_i mod m).
